Title: Living Dead Girl (aka Halloweenie)
Plot: When Dawson assists Todd in throwing a blow-out Halloween party, Todd and Natasha have Dawson believing he is seeing the ghost of a legendary film actress. Jen becomes suspicious about C.J., and Joey gets stuck taking Professor Heston's daughter to a haunted house with Eddie.
GuestStars: The Murder Dolls, Camille Canellas, Sam Robison, Marcus Hester, Barrett O'Brien, Daniel Valverde
